cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25,000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Only has 40,000 miles on it, but that's mostly due to the fact it hasn't started in 20 years!
This bad boy has all the edge you'll need out there on the streets. Flower holder included.
Rugged awesomeness. You won't believe how many animals you can accidentally run over in it! Mud not included.
Has a broken cd player that was installed wrong. Oops. My bad. Sorry/not sorry. Like for real, there were sparks and everything.
Has a secret drawer under the front seat to hide stuff. Expensive to fix, but whatevs.
